resources.string: One or more fields are empty!
Your old password does not match the saved one!
Do you want to delete this entry?

If you enable the \"Photo Trap\" feature, any person that you added to your trusted contacts and that knows your password will be able to trigger the photo trap via SMS at any time by providing the valid password, for as long as this feature is enabled. A dialog will show up on this device, and take a picture after interacting with the dialog. The picture will be send back to the person that triggered the Photo Trap. By ticking this checkbox, you agree that this app can take and provide photos as requested via SMS with a valid password. You can disable the feature or retract your consent at any time by unchecking this checkbox.

If you enable the \"Instant Photo\" feature, any person that you added to your trusted contacts and that knows your password will be able to request a photo via SMS at any time by providing the valid password, for as long as this feature is enabled. By ticking this checkbox, you agree that this app can take and provide photos as requested via SMS with a valid password. You can disable the feature or retract your consent at any time by unchecking this checkbox.

If you enable the \"GPS-position\" feature, any person that you added to your trusted contacts and that knows your password will be able to request the current location of this device via SMS by providing the valid password at any time, for as long as this feature is enabled. By ticking this checkbox, you agree that this app can access and provide GPS information as requested via SMS with a valid password. You can disable the feature or retract your consent at any time by unchecking this checkbox.
Your device will automatically shut down in 30 seconds!\nPlease confirm to shut down immediately or cancel.
